attributes.action: Ban Japanese Akita's From The Uk
attributes.additional_details:
Please ban vicious Japanese Akita's from the Uk

My puppy was savaged by a Japanese Akita on the 23/09/2013 only 3 half months old why out on her lead and witnessed by the people in my close. The attack was shocking and she didn't stand a chance because of the Japanese Akita my puppy had to be put down. The dog was out of control and is never allowed out has its so vicious. Now my Neighbours and myself fear for ours and our children's safety in case the dog gets out the house again and attacks. If my poor dog wasn't there it may well have been a person who was attacked.

There vicious dogs get them banned

Ban Japanese akita's before its too late.
